adjectives.description: qualifiable (comparative more qualifiable, superlative most qualifiable)

entries.meaning: Able to become qualified for something.
examples: Old entrance requirements which had screened out all but the most highly qualified were revised to include all those who could be considered qualifiable with standard on-the-job-training.

entries.meaning: Able to be modified, limited or restricted.
examples: Each consonant symbol in the shorthand is qualifiable with various vowel markers.
